downloadTitle: Integrate Yammer with on-premises SharePoint 2013 environments
downloadDescription: This white paper addresses how to replace the social features in SharePoint Server 2013 with equivalent Yammer features in a SharePoint Server 2013 on-premises deployment.

downloadFile.name: Lead with Yammer for SharePoint 2013 On Premises.doc
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/9/c/19ce52fa-f851-4aef-9791-9120ff6c6fd1/Lead with Yammer for SharePoint 2013 On Premises.doc

detailsSection: This white paper addresses how to replace the social features in SharePoint Server 2013 with equivalent Yammer features in a SharePoint Server 2013 on-premises deployment. The new Yammer app for SharePoint enables you to embed your Yammer feeds into SharePoint Server 2013 sites, making them more social and engaging.
detailsSection_file_name: Lead with Yammer for SharePoint 2013 On Premises.doc
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
